name: Pragmatic Semiconductor
description: Pragmatic Semiconductor is seeking a Graduate / Associate Software Engineer with experience in automation, testing, LabVIEW, and Git for on-site work to primarily develop test systems and conduct ATE Software diagnostics, alongside debugging and hardware modifications; candidates with skills in Python, hardware fault-finding, PCB design and modifications, and experience with NI SMUs, PXI, cRIO, cDAQ are highly desirable.
